This was an experiment to simulate [The Elm Architecture](https://guide.elm-lang.org/architecture/) 
in an [R-Shiny](https://shiny.rstudio.com/) app. The code is intended to mirror the Elm code in this
[Elm Calculator](https://github.com/armcn/elm-calculator) as closely as possible using R.
